name: StarFoxAqua
description:
This is part of the  MFGG Winter Fan Game, It will take you about 2-4 minutes to finish the game, 

Controls :

  • Move with arrows.
  • Shoot with space.

or Use the Mouse and Click (Some bugs)

Story :

Your Dutty as a StarFox's Member is to save the waterplanet  from a mechanical machine (Mecha-Crab)  that lives in the deep-Ocean with very high pressure so ( you are under-pressure )

Comments and further discutions

Maybe i will ripoff this proyect and continue with other name , you know nintendo will sue you just for blinking , i will change some art (not exactly my best work), I think i can add more levels , enemies and more changes, improve sound , add a secret routes as on starfox , points etc. let me know what do you think!
